name: Grave Secrets
description:
Entry made for the Harold Jam: Dark Universe.

The ending is rough but obtainable, have fun!

A treacherous plot is unfolding in the Kingdom of Aurelia.

When Sir Harold, the virtuous captain of the Aurelian Royal Knights, threatens to uncover the truth — he is struck down and cast into the abyss.

But this is not where our hero’s story ends.

Overcoming death itself, Harold must journey to save the kingdom from its dark fate, and protect the girl who may be the key to it all.

For in this world, not all secrets are taken to the grave…

Grave Secrets is a fantasy/puzzle/rpg made for the Harold Jam: Dark Universe. 

It is story driven with very light puzzle elements.

Install instructions

These is a ZIP file that must be opened to access the game files. Run the EXE to launch the game.

Controls:

Z/Enter/Spacebar = Accept

X/Esc/M = Cancel/Open menu

Arrow Keys or WASD = Move around

E or Page down to fast skip text.

Created by Charlottezxz & Conner Devlin
